text: Tobacco industry in Pakistan is a major employment provider in farming, manufacturing, distribution, and retail in Pakistan. Most of the agricultural cultivation is based in Charsadda District, Mardan District, Nowshera District, and Swabi District of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa. Tobacco is grown on 0.25 percent of irrigated land in Pakistan. As of 2016, 34,000 hectares were under cultivation which fell from 43,000 hectares a few years ago. ==Companies== * Pakistan Tobacco Company * Philip Morris Pakistan ==References== Category:Industries of Pakistan Pakistan Category:Tobacco in Pakistan Category:Economy of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
title: Tobacco industry in Pakistan
